entry.first: Feel free to explore my portfolio and see what I offer
entry.second: — I’d love to hear your thoughts!

services.paragraph: As a Full Stack Developer with a Computer Engineering degree from the University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, I enjoy building complete solutions — both server-side and client-side. Although I’m skilled across the stack, I’m especially passionate about Frontend development, where I can combine logic, design, and user experience.
